content: mini heart applique  finished size approximately 1 5in tall x 1 5in wide  materials  size 4 worsted weight yarn in rose  pictured is caron one pound in country rose  less than 1oz  h 5 0mm crochet hook  stitch marker  scissors  abbreviations  chain chain  double_crochet double_crochet  ea each  half_double_crochet half_double_crochet  single_crochet single_crochet  slip_stitch slip_stitch  st s stitch es  please message me with questions i m here to help cid 45540 cid 45582 cid 45584 cid 45585 cid 45586 cid 45583 wandering tree crochet 2024 pattern this heart is made in just one round each line represents the next stitch sequence in the round ch2 in 2nd chain from hook 4dc half_double_crochet single_crochet double_crochet single_crochet half_double_crochet 4dc slip_stitch tie the beginning and end tails together to make the dip more pronounced fasten_off weave in ends wandering tree crochet 2024
